subject: Boxing
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao agreed to settle a federal defamation case in Las Vegas, clearing a key hurdle to a long-awaited bout between two fighters who’ve traded verbal jabs for years.
snippet: Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao agreed to settle a federal defamation case in Las Vegas, clearing a key hurdle to a long-awaited bout between two fighters who’ve traded verbal jabs for years.
